actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution condemning the indiscriminate killing of innocent and unarmed civilians and other acts of sabotage committed by the Mozambique National Resistance (RENAMO) and urging President Reagan to continue to recognize the Mozambican Government.

summary.text: Condemns the indiscriminate sabotage committed by the Mozambique National Resistance (RENAMO). Urges the President to continue to recognize the Mozambican Government.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution condemning the indiscriminate killing of innocent and unarmed civilians and other acts of sabotage committed by the Mozambique National Resistance (RENAMO) and urging President Reagan to continue to recognize the Mozambican Government.
